description_for_human: Free open-source visual trading strategy builder for MetaTrader 5. Build automated forex trading strategies with drag-and-drop nodes.
description_for_model: AI Trade Agent is a free, open-source Electron desktop application for building visual trading strategies for MetaTrader 5 (MT5). Users can create automated forex trading bots without coding using a drag-and-drop node-based editor. Features include: visual node editor with triggers, indicators (MA, RSI), logic gates, and trade execution nodes; direct MT5 integration for live trading; historical backtesting; paper trading simulator; risk management tools; SMS/WhatsApp alerts via Twilio; plugin system for custom nodes; market sentiment analysis.
